name: image_anime_diffusion
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool image_diffusion.
Tool description: Diffusion APIs
API description: Generates anime-style images based on the given parameters using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

steps.description: The number of diffusion steps, with a maximum of 50.

image_num.description: The number of images to generate, with a maximum of 4.

width.description: The width of the generated image(s), with a maximum of 1024 pixels.

cfg.description: The configuration scale for image generation, with a maximum of 20.

height.description: The height of the generated image(s), with a maximum of 1024 pixels.

prompt.description: A textual description of the desired image content.

negative_prompt.description: A textual description of elements to avoid in the image. This parameter is not required in version 2.
